trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 14th 2009
Summary: Ufo spotted over New york city
divs: sighting detailshi, i'm living in hoboken nj and am a big follower of ufo's. on monday 14 sept at 5.26pm i was going outside to have a smoke and as always i look up at the sky. it's a very clear day out today and when i looked up i could see a plane shining and just to the left of the plane was a shiny object just floting. i ran inside and grabed my binoculars to have a look. the object was a good few 100 feet in the air if not 1000 feet. it looked like it was a circle shape but when i looked at it trough the binoculars it was in a triangle shape and was silver and gray as there was a reflection off the sun. it was just sitting there for about 2 mins and then it started to move up. when i went to grab my phone out of my pocket it disapired. just wanted to let you know what i saw and that it's not the first ufo iv seen in new york\new jersey. i'm still keeping an eye out now so if i see anything else il let you know. thanks brian
